hadiths.text: Narrated AbuHurayrah: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: On the Day of resurrection Allah will not accept repentance or ransom from him who learns excellence of speech to captivate thereby the hearts of men, or of people

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْمُتَشَدِّقِ فِي الْكَلاَمِ
chapter.eng-name: What has been narrated about eloquent speech
